item.description:
After a busy beginning of summer (at least for me), it's time to have a new "social" meetup !

We're going to meet this coming Sunday (the 19th of Aug) at Asian Garden restaurant in Chinatown. It's a good occasion for new members (and not "new") to chat, have fun, while at the same time having diner !

It's a yellow color restaurant, short walking distance distance from the Chinatown T stop (orange line), between Beach St & Essex St.

Please, it would be nice if you could reserve your space as soon as possible, so we can reserve the right amount of space !
item.name: Social Meetup: Asian Garden restaurant
